SELECT dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` as rrProblemOrderId, dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_STATE` as rrProblemOrderState, problem.`problem_status` as problemStatus, problem.`problem_no` as problemNo, problem.`problem_type` as problemType, problem.`engineering`, problem.`customer`, problem.`vehicle`, problem.product_no as productNo, problem.`bad_content` as badContent, problem.`severity`, problem.`product_line` as productLine, problem.`reason_for_delay` as reasonForDelay, problem.`Speed_of_progress` as speedOfProgress, problem.root_cause as rootCause, problem.permanent_game as permanentGame, (select dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` from dpcoi_wo_order dwo where dwo.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` and dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` in (1, 2, 3)) as dpcoiWoOrderType from dpcoi_order dor, dpcoi_rr_problem problem
order by dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` desc limit #{start},#{size}
SELECT count(1) from dpcoi_order dor, dpcoi_rr_problem problem
